description.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市的最高行政首长。该职务起源于1920年，日治时期最初称为市尹，1940年改称市长。1967年台北市升格为院辖市后市长由总统任命，1994年改为直辖市后恢复由市民直接选举产生。
description.en: The chief executive of Taipei, Taiwan, Republic of China. The position originated in 1920, initially called 'Shīin' (市尹) during the Japanese rule period, and was renamed to 'Shìzhǎng' (市長) in 1940. After Taipei was upgraded to a special municipality in 1967, the mayor was appointed by the President. Since 1994, the mayor has been directly elected by the citizens.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，现任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Kuomintang (KMT) and the current Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，为首任台北市市尹。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, serving as the first 'Shīin' (mayor) of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，为台北市改制为省辖市后首任市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, and the first mayor of Taipei after it was reorganized as a provincial city.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，为台北市升格为院辖市后首任市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, and the first mayor of Taipei after it was upgraded to a special municipality.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，为台北市改制为直辖市后首任民选市长，后当选中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a member of the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP). He was the first popularly elected mayor after Taipei became a special municipality and was later elected President of the Republic of China.

en: President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家元首。在1967年至1994年期间负责任命台北市市长。
description.en: The head of state of the Republic of China. Was responsible for appointing the Mayor of Taipei between 1967 and 1994.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院的决策机关。在1994年以前负责提名台北市市长人选。
description.en: The decision-making body of the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China. It was responsible for nominating candidates for the Mayor of Taipei before 1994.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党之一。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的最高统治者。
description.en: The highest ruler of Taiwan during the period of Japanese rule.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期的台湾总督，发布了《台湾州制》与《台湾市制》。
description.en: Governor-General of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period who promulgated the 'Taiwan Prefecture System' and 'Taiwan City System'.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾总督田健治郎发布的律令，用以规范台湾的行政区划。
description.en: An ordinance issued by Governor-General Den Kenjirō during the Japanese rule period to regulate the administrative divisions of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾总督田健治郎与中川健藏先后发布的律令，用以规范台湾的市级行政。
description.en: Ordinances issued successively by Governors-General Den Kenjirō and Nakagawa Kenzō during the Japanese rule period to regulate municipal administration in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期的台湾总督，发布了修改后的《台湾市制》。
description.en: Governor-General of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period who promulgated the revised 'Taiwan City System'.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，曾任台北市市尹。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, who served as 'Shīin' (mayor) of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，曾任台北市市尹。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, who served as 'Shīin' (mayor) of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，曾任台北市市尹。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, who served as 'Shīin' (mayor) of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，曾任台北市市尹。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, who served as 'Shīin' (mayor) of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，曾任台北市市尹。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, who served as 'Shīin' (mayor) of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，曾任台北市市尹。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, who served as 'Shīin' (mayor) of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，曾任台北市市尹。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, who served as 'Shīin' (mayor) of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，为末任台北市市尹及首任台北市长。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, serving as the last 'Shīin' and the first mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, who served as mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, who served as mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的官员，为末任台北市长。
description.en: An official in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, serving as the last mayor of Taipei under Japanese rule.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，曾任台湾省行政长官。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China, who served as the Governor of Taiwan Province.

description.zh-cn: 1945年至1947年间中华民国台湾省的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of Taiwan Province, Republic of China, from 1945 to 1947.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在台湾的军事机构，负责台湾地区的安全与戒严事务。
description.en: A military organization of the Republic of China in Taiwan, responsible for the security and martial law affairs of the Taiwan area.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府在第二次世界大战后接收台湾的最高统治机关。
description.en: The highest ruling body of the Republic of China government for the takeover of Taiwan after World War II.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台湾省行政长官公署秘书长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Secretary-General of the Taiwan Provincial Administrative Executive Office.

en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌理外交事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省在实施地方自治初期的最高民意机关。
description.en: The highest representative body of Taiwan Province, Republic of China, during the initial period of local autonomy implementation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

en: Ministry of Finance of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌理财政事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for financial affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国过去的最高政权机关之一。
description.en: One of the former highest political bodies of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taiwan Province, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物及企业家，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician and entrepreneur of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省政府的最高首长。
description.en: The chief executive of the Taiwan Provincial Government, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台湾省政府主席，推荐吴三连担任台北市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Governor of Taiwan Provincial Government and recommended Wu San-lien for the mayorship of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高立法机关。
description.en: The highest legislative body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任立法委员，推荐吴三连担任台北市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as a member of the Legislative Yuan and recommended Wu San-lien for the mayorship of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾代理台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the acting Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省政府下辖的民政事务主管机关。
description.en: The competent authority for civil affairs under the Taiwan Provincial Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾代理台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the acting Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

en: Ministry of the Interior of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌理内政事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for internal affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省政府下辖的建设事务主管机关。
description.en: The competent authority for construction affairs under the Taiwan Provincial Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长，后当选中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei and was later elected President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国高雄市的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of Kaohsiung, Taiwan, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

nodes.id: 中华民国中央选举委员会

zh-cn: 中华民国中央选举委员会
en: Central Election Commission of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌理选举事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for election affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长及中国国民党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei and Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党之一。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长，后当选中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei and was later elected President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物及医师，曾以无党籍身份当选并连任台北市市长，后创立台湾民众党。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician, who was elected and re-elected as Mayor of Taipei as an independent, and later founded the Taiwan People's Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党之一，由柯文哲创立。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China, founded by Ko Wen-je.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的行政区划之一。
description.en: An administrative division of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾总督府下的机构，负责土木工程。
description.en: An agency under the Government-General of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, responsible for civil engineering.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的行政区划之一。
description.en: An administrative division of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的行政区划之一。
description.en: An administrative division of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的行政区划之一。
description.en: An administrative division of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾总督府下的机构，负责警务。
description.en: An agency under the Government-General of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, responsible for police affairs.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾总督府下的机构，负责产业发展。
description.en: An agency under the Government-General of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, responsible for industrial development.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的行政区划之一。
description.en: An administrative division of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾总督府下的机构，负责关税事务。
description.en: An agency under the Government-General of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, responsible for customs affairs.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的行政区划之一。
description.en: An administrative division of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾总督府下的机构，负责内务。
description.en: An agency under the Government-General of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, responsible for internal affairs.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾总督府下的机构，为总督的秘书处。
description.en: An agency under the Government-General of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, serving as the secretariat for the Governor-General.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的行政区划之一。
description.en: An administrative division of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾总督府下的机构，负责外事。
description.en: An agency under the Government-General of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, responsible for foreign affairs.

en: Ministry of Transportation and Communications of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌理交通及通讯事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for transportation and communication affairs.

description.zh-cn: 现任台北市市长。
description.en: Current Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 蒋万安是中国国民党籍政治人物。
description.en: Chiang Wan-an is a politician of the Kuomintang (KMT).

description.zh-cn: 在1967年至1994年期间，台北市长由总统任命。
description.en: Between 1967 and 1994, the Mayor of Taipei was appointed by the President.

description.zh-cn: 在1994年以前，台北市长由行政院会议提名。
description.en: Before 1994, the Mayor of Taipei was nominated by the Executive Yuan Council.

description.zh-cn: 田健治郎曾任台湾总督。
description.en: Den Kenjirō served as the Governor-General of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 以律令第三号发布《台湾州制》。
description.en: Promulgated the 'Taiwan Prefecture System' as Ordinance No. 3.

description.zh-cn: 以律令第五号发布《台湾市制》。
description.en: Promulgated the 'Taiwan City System' as Ordinance No. 5.

description.zh-cn: 中川健藏曾任台湾总督。
description.en: Nakagawa Kenzō served as the Governor-General of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 以律令第三号发布《台湾市制》，确立台北市的法人地位。
description.en: Promulgated the 'Taiwan City System' as Ordinance No. 3, establishing the legal personality of Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 首任州辖市时期台北市市尹。
description.en: First Shīin (mayor) of Taipei during the provincial city period under Japanese rule.

description.zh-cn: 就任台北市市尹前担任新竹厅厅长。
description.en: Served as the Administrator of Shinchiku Chō before becoming the Shīin of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 卸任台北市市尹后改任台湾总督府土木局局长。
description.en: After leaving the post of Taipei Shīin, he was appointed Director of the Civil Engineering Bureau of the Government-General of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 任内官制改正，市尹改称市长。
description.en: During his term, the official title was changed from Shīin to Mayor.

description.zh-cn: 任命黄朝琴兼任台北市市长。
description.en: Appointed Huang Chao-chin as the concurrent Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 首任省辖市市长。
description.en: First mayor of the provincial city.

position.zh-cn: 教育团体教育会南区代表
position.en: Representative of the Southern District of the Education Group of the Education Association

description.zh-cn: 时任台湾省政府主席的吴国桢推荐吴三连担任台北市长。
description.en: Wu Kuo-chen, then Governor of Taiwan Provincial Government, recommended Wu San-lien for the mayorship of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 时任立法委员的蔡培火推荐吴三连担任台北市长。
description.en: Tsai Pei-huo, then a member of the Legislative Yuan, recommended Wu San-lien for the mayorship of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 官派省辖市市长，无党籍。
description.en: Appointed mayor of the provincial city, independent.

description.zh-cn: 首任民选省辖市市长，无党籍。
description.en: First popularly elected mayor of the provincial city, independent.

description.zh-cn: 民选省辖市市长，无党籍。
description.en: Elected mayor of the provincial city, independent.

description.zh-cn: 民选省辖市市长，无党籍。
description.en: Elected mayor of the provincial city, independent.

description.zh-cn: 首任院辖市市长，由总统任命，无党籍。
description.en: First mayor of the special municipality, appointed by the President, independent.

description.zh-cn: 民选省辖市市长，任期因涉弊案而中断。
description.en: Elected mayor of the provincial city, his term was interrupted due to a corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 就任台北市长前为高雄市市长。
description.en: Served as Mayor of Kaohsiung before becoming Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 先代理市长，后获市议会通过转正。
description.en: First served as acting mayor, then was officially confirmed by the city council.

description.zh-cn: 首位民选直辖市市长。
description.en: First popularly elected mayor of the special municipality.

description.zh-cn: 第一任期为无党籍，与民主进步党整合；第二任期为无党籍，后加入台湾民众党。
description.en: In his first term, he was an independent aligned with the Democratic Progressive Party; in his second term, he was an independent and later joined the Taiwan People's Party.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲于第二届市长任期中创立并加入台湾民众党。
description.en: Ko Wen-je founded and joined the Taiwan People's Party during his second term as mayor.
